slides.section_body: Illustration permissions are crucial for academic integrity. It is essential to give credit to those whose work contributes to our understanding. By acknowledging sources, we foster a culture of respect and collaboration in research.
slides.quote: Acknowledging contributions is the foundation of scholarly communication.

slides.section_body: Figures included in this chapter acknowledge the original creators. Specific sources are referenced to maintain transparency and accuracy. It is important to provide proper attribution to uphold ethical research standards.
slides.quote: Proper attribution honors the work of the original creators.

slides.section_body: Some figures may have been modified from their original form. Such adaptations should be explicitly noted to inform readers of any changes made. This practice enhances the credibility of your work.
slides.quote: Transparency about modifications builds trust with your audience.

slides.section_body: For example, Figure 3 is modified from a study published in NASA Tech Briefs. Citing this work exemplifies the proper way to attribute modified figures. It serves as a model for future citations.
slides.quote: Citing sources is more than a formality; it's an ethical obligation.

slides.section_body: Figures sourced from online publications, such as those from NCBI, play a significant role in academic discourse. Including links ensures accessibility for further reading. Always verify the reliability of online sources.
slides.quote: Reliable sources are the cornerstone of credible research.

slides.section_body: Figures contribute visually to the understanding of complex topics. Publications must accurately represent and cite these visuals. This practice enriches the reader's experience and comprehension.
slides.quote: Visuals are not just decoration; they enhance understanding.

slides.section_body: Visual aids can simplify and clarify intricate information. They serve as a bridge between text and understanding. Quality visuals can transform abstracts into tangible insights.
slides.quote: Effective visuals turn complex ideas into clear concepts.

slides.section_body: Collaboration among researchers often brings illustrations to life. Highlighting joint efforts strengthens the academic community. Mutual respect in citation fosters stronger research networks.
slides.quote: Collaboration is the heart of innovative research.

slides.section_body: Respecting illustration permissions enhances the integrity of research. Committing to proper attribution is a fundamental practice in academia. It reflects the values of respect and professionalism.
slides.quote: Integrity in research begins with honoring the original creators.

slides.section_body: Maintaining ethical standards ensures the ongoing respect for research. Every figure and illustration tells a story that deserves acknowledgment. Upholding these standards is pivotal for future learners.
slides.quote: Ethical standards shape the future of academic research.
